entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
